keyMoments.title: Departure for Enies Lobby Rescue
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates (minus Robin who is captured and Sanji who is on the Puffing Tom) depart Water 7 aboard the Rocketman to rescue Robin from CP9 and the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of one of the crew's most daring rescue missions, attacking a World Government stronghold directly.

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Franky Family
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats form an alliance with the Franky Family, allowing them to join the rescue mission to save Franky from CP9.
keyMoments.significance: Expands the rescue force and shows Luffy's willingness to work with former adversaries toward a common goal.

keyMoments.title: Joining the Rescue Mission
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family begs Luffy to let them join the mission to rescue their boss Franky from CP9. Luffy immediately agrees, and they join by riding King Bulls tethered to the Rocketman.
keyMoments.significance: The Franky Family shifts from antagonists to allies, joining forces with the Straw Hats to save Franky and confront the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Departure for Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family departs Water 7 alongside the Straw Hats, riding King Bulls attached to the Rocketman as they head toward Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: The Franky Family commits to attacking a World Government stronghold to save their boss, showing their loyalty and courage.
